MS MCQs

    Create budgets in Dynamics 365 Business Central

    »

    1. What is true about the Copy Budget function?

      You can specify the number of periods to which the budget should be copied.

      It’s not possible to copy from one budget to another.

      You can use G/L entries as the source for the new budget entries.

      By selecting Sales Budget in the Source field, you can copy a G/L budget from a sales budget.


    2. What is the maximum number of dimensions that you can use in a budget?

      Two

      Four

      Six

      Unlimited
